title: Jocko Podcast 213 w/ Echo Charles: Patton's General Orders and Instructions to His Troops
description:
Join the conversation on Twitter/Instagram:
@jockowillink @echocharles

0:00:00 - Opening: Patton's Speech to his troops. June 5th, 1944.

2:02:30 - Final thoughts and take-aways.

2:06:34 - How to Stay on THE PATH.
